      • validate

        public final void validate(Context respCtx,
            BaseTicket clientTicket,
            Game game)
                    throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: TicketValidator
        Validate ticket according to the fundamental type(operation parameter, racing...).
        指定者:
        validate 在接口中 TicketValidator
        参数:
        respCtx - The transaction context.
        clientTicket - The ticket will be validated.
        game - The game associated with ticket.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter any business exception.
